Step-1:Online Aptitude test

Step-2:Group discussions(depends on company)

Step-3:Personal Interviews

Step-4:HR round

Tip-1:it should have your name,contact no,education,experience,leadership roles(if any)

Tip-2:mention internships and projects clearly in a detailed manner

Tip-3:Dont mention other unnecssary and personal details

1. The training and placement cell of LDCE follows one student, one job policy. Once the candidate is selected in their core company, his/her name will be removed from the placement database.

2. If results are delayed student will be allowed to seat in another company.

3. If the data filled by candidates is found faulty, he/she will not be allowed to seat in further placement process.

4. All the candidate should come in completely formal for the placement drive.

5. If the candidate register for the drive for particular compamy, he/she will not be able to leave the process in between.
